vote.title: A resolution (1) declaring approximately 37,925 square feet of improved land unwanted and unneeded, located near the intersection of Forest Lane and Greenville Avenue, and authorizing its advertisement for sale by public auction; (2) authorizing a Purchase and Sale Agreement to be prepared for the auctioned surplus property receiving the highest qualified bid that is sold absolute; and (3) waiving the minimum reserve amount - Estimated Revenue: TBD
